name: RB Rail AS
bossPosition: CEO / Chairman of the Management Board
goal: The main business of the Company is the design, construction and marketing (including branding) of the Rail Baltic/Rail Baltica - conventional 1435 gauge railway infrastructure in Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania. The project has recieved 80%-85% financing from EU.
euInitiatives:
North Sea Baltic Corridor
"Development of a 1435 mm standard gauge railway line in the Rail Baltic/Rail Baltica (RB) corridor through Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania" ("the action"), action number 2014-EU-TMC-0560-M
the Regulation (EU) No 1316/2013 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 11 December 2013 establishing the Connecting Europe Facility, amending Regulation (EU) No 913/2010 and repealing Regulations (EC) No 680/2007 and (EC) No 67/2010
